translations: n.葫芦（gourd 的复数形式）；脑瓜

sentences.sentence: Peas were brushed and gourds poled.
sentences.translation: 豌豆打了尖，葫芦支上了棍。

sentences.sentence: Carving gourds into elaborately decorated lanterns dates back thousands of years to Africa.
sentences.translation: 将葫芦精雕细刻、做成灯笼的习俗可追溯到几千年前的非洲。

sentences.sentence: He shows me a collection of hollowed-out gourds filled to the brim with what look to be colored pebbles.
sentences.translation: 他给我展示了一批镂空的葫芦罐，里面贮满了像彩色卵石一样的东西。
